key_risks: Raw material volatility, particularly for titanium dioxide and other chemicals
Supply chain disruptions due to global logistics challenges and material shortages
Compliance with stringent environmental regulations, especially regarding VOC emissions and waste management
Ongoing litigation, including a $400 million lead paint abatement case in California
Intense competition from major players like PPG Industries and AkzoNobel
controversies: Lead paint litigation with a $400 million abatement case in California
Settlement of a $3.65 million class-action lawsuit over wage and hour violations
Ongoing labor strike at the Bedford Heights plant since February 2024
environmental_issues: Compliance with environmental regulations on VOC emissions and waste management
24% of production facilities located in high-water-risk areas
social_issues: Labor disputes and ongoing strike at the Bedford Heights plant
Wage and hour violations leading to a $3.65 million settlement
governance_issues: Disputes with insurers over indemnification for lead paint litigation
Concerns over labor practices and compliance with labor laws
